page.title: 18Housing
page.content: A survey was made of houses in two square Kms. covering the most densely populated part of Aberystwyth. In square Km. 02580281 the number of houses was {1161}.Many houses have been converted into flats,the number being{286}.We conclude that this high number accounts for the fact that Aberystwyth has a large number of students requiring accommodation. Housing is required for students who attend the University,College of Librarianship,College of Agriculture, Theological College and College of Further Education. In square Km. 02590281 the number of houses was only{392}and the amount of flats was{20}.We conclude that these numbers are smaller because most of the area is taken up by the University campus,the National Library ,Bronglais Hospital and a sec. school.
